Package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.table.annotations

Annotation Interface TableInfo

@Target(TYPE) @Retention(RUNTIME) public @interface TableInfo
Defines metadata for locating and interacting with a table in the UI. This annotation is applied to a row model class to specify how the table is identified and structured.

It provides three key locators:

  • tableContainerLocator - Identifies the table container element.
  • rowsLocator - Identifies the rows inside the table.
  • headerRowLocator - Identifies the header row.

The table framework uses this annotation at runtime to extract table structure and dynamically read or manipulate table data.
